Welcome to Microbial Comparative Genomics Tools's documentation!
================================================================

Contents:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2

   Tutorial
   Scripts
   Modules

Here is a collection of scripts to perform comparative genomic analysis on microbial genomes.
